cs.man.ac.uk.observers

Class NullAttributeClassObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.man.ac.uk.observers.NullAttributeClassObserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeClassObserver

    public class NullAttributeClassObserver
extends java.lang.Object
implements AttributeClassObserver
    Class for observing the class data distribution for a null attribute. This method is used to disable the observation for an attribute. Based on code in MOA written by Richard Kirkby, modified by Rob Lyon.
    Author:
    Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz), Rob Lyon
